title: What are the disadvantages of OLED display? - Quora

response.answer_text: The blue light-emitting OLED material degrades faster than other color materials, so the blue light output is relatively small.Water can instantly damage the organic materials in the OLED display, so an excellent sealing process is required to protect the screen.The OLED screen consumes a lot of power when displaying images with a white background such as a website or a document.Burning screen problem, this is a problem often reported since the application of OLED screen.OLED panel production is extremely difficult and expensive.You can also purchase more iphone LCD display from Mobilesentrix.com

A quick list will probably be: Relatively short life span of OLED materials (compared to inorganic-LED, at least)Sensitivity of OLED materials to oxygen/moisture (which means that a good encapsulation is necessary)High cost of production (mostly due to relatively difficult production process and the fact that production fabs are still smaller and fewer compared to LCD fabs).See more: https://www.oled-info.com/introduction
